attributes.action: STOP the database for phones and e-mails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Clearly this EU Directive is a gross violation of the privacy laws.  Apart from the huge cost that such a database would entail, the record of Govt. DBs is very poor; delayed overspend, lack of security, lost data etc. make it a total disaster in the making

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
